org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.fastdom
Class AeXMLFormatter.AeIndentingWriter

java.lang.Object
  java.io.Writer
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.fastdom.AeXMLFormatter.AeIndentingWriter
Enclosing class:
AeXMLFormatter
protected static class AeXMLFormatter.AeIndentingWriter
extends java.io.Writer

Wraps another Writer with methods to write new lines with indenting white space at the beginning of each new line.

Field Summary
private  int mIndent
          The current indent level.
private  boolean mIsFreshLine
          true if and only if the writer is at the start of a fresh line.

          Character sequence to use to separate lines.
private  java.io.Writer mOut

private  char[] mSpaces
          Holds spaces for indentation.

writeln

public void writeln()
             throws java.io.IOException
Writes a new line only if this writer is not already at the start of a fresh line. This eliminates unnecessary blank lines.

Throws:
java.io.IOException
